meanings.definition: A dog that is a cross between a Labrador Retriever and a Poodle.
meanings.sent1: My friend has a fluffy labradoodle as a pet.
meanings.sent2: The labradoodle at the park was friendly and playful.
meanings.sent3: The labradoodle tried to fetch a ball bigger than itself!
meanings.sent4: The labradoodle's curly fur was a mix of Labrador and Poodle magic.
meanings.sent5: Children giggled as the labradoodle chased its tail in circles.
